name: _PLAY
description:
A mini-puzzle game that plays around with this year's Global Game Jam concept "Duality".
The main concept is involving around controlling 2 objects that work opposite to each other so it turns out to be a game about controlling the 2 pointers that mirror each other to solve to puzzle.
With some twist with the rule on each level making the core mechanic having much more possibility to explore on level design but unfortunately since the time on the jam is short. I can only put on some of the major mechanics only and didn't have much time to combine each mechanic into more unique levels.
I might be taking a look at this project later to make a post-jam version with some systems such as time-attack mode or life reduction.
but in a meantime. I hope you guys will enjoy this mini puzzle game.
Thanks
